actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To prohibit the Government from requiring any person to assist in devising a method for breaking the encryption of a wire or oral communication.

summary.text:
Protect Our Devices Act of 2016

This bill prohibits the federal government from requiring a person to assist in devising a method for breaking the encryption of a wire or oral communication.

titles.title: To prohibit the Government from requiring any person to assist in devising a method for breaking the encryption of a wire or oral communication.
